original_title: Iron Savior: Live at the Final Frontier
overview: German power metal outfit Iron Savior will release the band's first ever DVD/Live CD "Live At The Final Frontier" on May 29th.  This set includes the recordings of the band's hometown show in Hamburg (from January 2015) and comes as exclusive DVD/2CD Digipak via AFM Records.
title: Iron Savior: Live at the Final Frontier
